name: Magic Coffee Shop
description:
A point-and-click short story about a regular guy named Garry. His first job as a witch's intern is to pick up coffee.

Approximate length: 40 minutes

Content: mild language, drug and alcohol references

More of Garry's adventures as a witch's intern are in my 2017 Inktober drawings: https://www.deviantart.com/mysteriousj/art/The-Witch-and-the-Intern-Inktober-201...
